page.title: 13Law And Order In Wash Common
page.content: Our local policeman said that vandalism and burglary were the crimes that had increased most in the last ten years.In the past 20 years fraud and computer crimes have developed as new crimes.He said that crimes involving violence worry him most. He also said that very few serious juvenile crimes are committed but when they are they are exaggerated by the media and people get a wrong impression.Coming to our school is one of his jobs and he thinks warning children is a good idea.Since this was started childrens' crimes have gone down 30%.The policeman said that punishment was not a police job but up to the magistrate in the crown court. The first police dogs used in Newbury were borrowed from kennels at Wash Water in our area.
